name: Git Hooks Setup
description: Installs and configures modular git hooks system with argbash-enhanced setup script

bashRcDFileName.description: Filename for the bashrc.d script that sets up the git hooks environment

hooksDir.description: Directory containing git hooks relative to workspace root

autoSetup.description: Space-separated list of paths containing git repositories for automatic hook setup. Set to empty string to disable auto-setup.

gitSafeDirectory.description: Git safe.directory pattern to configure (supports wildcards). Set to empty string to skip configuration.

postAttachCommand: if [ -n "${AUTOSETUP}" ]; then for path in ${AUTOSETUP}; do if [ -d "$path" ]; then echo "Setting up git hooks for: $path"; (cd "$path" && setup-git-hooks) || echo "Failed to setup hooks in $path"; fi; done; fi
